comment.author: 73199923@N00
comment._content: Cant be the GPO Tower dismantled ? Here is a good 1945 aerial photo showing the antenna in George Street next to Gowings Bldg photosau.com.au/CosMaps/maps/pdf/AO1/AO035.pdf

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hpeters] I believe the tower you're referring to was the 2UW tower. There is another image here. acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=13243 Read about radio station 2UW here www.radioheritage.net/Story196.asp

comment.author: 73199923@N00
comment._content: Another great story of 2UW trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17017502 Now sadly Mix 106.5 :(

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: For a short while they broadcast as Magic FM. At about the same time they moved from Kent Street (their home after the State Building) to Neutral Bay. I recall using their studios to record some commercials in the 1980s.
